meanings.definition: The quality or state of being methodical.
meanings.sent1: Her methodicalnesses in organizing her desk made it easy to find everything.
meanings.sent2: His methodicalnesses in following the recipe step by step resulted in a delicious meal.
meanings.sent3: The methodicalnesses of the squirrel in gathering nuts was quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: The methodicalnesses of the ants in building their nest was like watching a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The methodicalnesses of the librarian in categorizing books made the library a joy to explore.

meanings.definition: The systematic and orderly approach to tasks or activities.
meanings.sent1: The team's methodicalnesses in planning the project ensured its success.
meanings.sent2: The methodicalnesses of the students in completing their assignments on time was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The methodicalnesses of the penguins in lining up for their daily swim was both cute and efficient.
meanings.sent4: The methodicalnesses of the bees in pollinating flowers is essential for the ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The methodicalnesses of the gardener in arranging the flowers created a beautiful display.
